strings:
<center>My name is Aegeus
<center>and I was once called
<center>the son of a goddess.

<center>“But like everyone else, I realized
<center>that I was weak and vulnerable.

<center>"As soon as the Dark Lord is sealed,
<center>I will sacrifice my life to save others."

<center>"I have come here to write the final prophecy.
<center>I pray that the eyes of dharma see."

<center>I look forward to the dark times
<center>and anticipate them.

<center>- It's time for the Dark Lord of Raiders
<center>to terrorize the world again.

<center>But don't despair.
<center>Because our generation will live forever.

<center>“When the time comes...
<center>we will each have a living heir.”

<center>The heir to the mighty warrior Golding
<center>lives with his two sons.
<center>The voice of satisfied people.

<center>The wizard's successor, Sir Gojo,
<center>carries on this tradition and teaches magic
<center>in a village near the castle.
<center>where the power of the king was sealed

<center>“Followers of the great wizard Peel
<center>have given up magic and live
<center>with demons in the middle of the forest.

<center>Alessandro Spada's version was passed on
<center>to other families and his heirs
<center>became famous throughout the country.

<center>Cardan, the great prince of the world,
<center>dutifully lived among the snowy mountains.
<center>Protect the Legend of the Restless Bird.

<center>The King's descendants return
<center>from Heaven to Earth to become
<center>faithful guardians of many souls.

<center>“My successor will ultimately
<center>live the remainder of his life
<center>as the Sangha Leader.

<center>"As long as you're alone,
<center>the world will always be safe.

<center>"We must protect their lives
<center>or the Dark Lord will return and one day
<center>the light of this world will go out."

<center>"Then I pray to the Goddess just to make sure
<center>that my son keeps his promise."
